ability.name: Cups and Balls
ability.description: * Place the Page of Cups on Cups and Balls * While a card is on Cups and Balls: * All of your cards now count as Cups, as well as their original suit. * This includes Major Arcana: A Death, for example, counts as a "13 of Cups". * Discard the Page of Cups at will.
ability.flavor: No matter how hard they try to hit you, it seems like you're always one step ahead.
